description.value: NPC Talent, NPC gains X Fate/Infamy Points that they can spend or burn as a player would. They can also perform Righteous Fury/Zealous Hatred. Note: Such NPCs should be of significance or power, if saving time by not using Critical damage for regular enemies, these ones should take it.
